products.name: Guitar Strings
products.description: These are favored by many musicians around the globe. Made from a nickel-plated, steel wire wrapped around a hex-shaped, steel core wire.The plain strings are made of specially tempered, tin-plated, high-carbon steel, producing a well-balanced tone.

products.name: Guitar Picks (12-pack)
products.description: A wider body and a rounded tip have made this pick a favorite with players of every style. Celluloid picks combine the traditional tone and feel of celluloid, with beautiful and unique colors.

products.name: Drum Sticks (Pair)
products.description: These 100% hickory drum sticks are made in the USA.

products.name: Violin Bow
products.description: Made with an octagonal Brazilwood stick, a half-lined ebony frog and Mongolian horsehair. It features a pearl eye and slide, nickel/silver ferrule and leather grip.

products.name: Alto Saxophone Reeds (Box of 3)
products.description: High-quality reeds designed for a wide variety of playing situations, these are cut from the most flexible grade of cane.

products.name: Music Stand
products.description: A portable orchestral tripod music stand, ideal for orchestras, conductors, musicians, and schools. Features a solid, oversized desk that provides ample and secure space for the largest books and scores, and its built-in clips keeps music sheets stable throughout performances and rehearsals.
